resources.string: MUSIC GENRE MENU Here is the main menu of the app with music genre list provided in the music directory of the user\'s device. To access to these lists we could use an URI. We use explicit intents to call each listed genre categories
ARTISTS LIST PER GENRE Here we can choose between some artists who played a music selected by music genre. Each button trigger an explicit intent which open the artist\'s song list activity
SONG LIST FROM SELECTED ARTIST CATEGORY Here we can choose between some song music. Each button trigger an explicit intent which open the play song activity
SONGS FROM SELECTED ARTIST LIST Here we can play the song selected in the previous list of songs. The track will be managed by using MediaPlayer class with a static Method create() of this class
